column1: * 1939 - Writer and screenwriter Peter S. Beagle is born.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Dr. Denis Tolhurst.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to John Higgins.
* 2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online developer Turbine is bought by Warner Bros.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game was released.
